title: I am utterly disgusted and done
body: Akali, Fizz and Ekko building full tank and still doing so much damage. At this point I'm fucking done. This shit has gotten to the point where I want to break down because it's so disgusting and absurd. Why haven't these champions gotten base damage nerfs on their abilities? I just had a game where an akali rushed spirit visage and completely fucked me over just with that item. Honeslty ask yourself how is that fair? Its not and I'm done with it and if I see this bullshit again I'm going afk otherwise I will lose my shit and possibly get depressed which is not what I want so Riot I want to see something done about this NOW. I refuse to play a game where something on this scale exists, its just game breaking and bending the rules on how items and champions should work. Tank =/ damage

I will admit I went a bit overboard because at the current time I was extremely pissed but your interpretation of what I'm saying is incorrect. These champions are all **mages**, their damage and utility comes off of building items such as {{item:3089}}, {{item:3165}} and {{item:3285}}. They're not champions like Mundo so why should building full tank benefit them just as much? Don't you think its just a little game breaking?

Building tank doesn't benefit them lol. Akali has nothing in her kit that building tank benefits her except for pretty decent base damage. Tank benefits someone like malphite because of his passive, his w giving % arm increase and e doing more damage with more arm. He also has lots of cc so that getting behind doesn't cause issues for him. Akali has a garbage lvl 1-5 and is exploitable and shouldn't get ahead for building tank to be a viable option. No, it's not game breaking. I dare you to play tank akali in high elo and see how well you do. I can tell you really need to focus on your own issues in game rather than blaming things such as champions for not being able to climb, or teammates for that matter.
